actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to make certain off-system bridge projects funded by State and local sources eligible for Federal bridge assistance.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation, upon State request, to credit any amount expended by State and local sources for eligible off-system bridge construction projects towards the non-Federal share of other State projects eligible for Federal funds if such expended amount exceeds 20 percent of construction costs.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to make certain off-system bridge projects funded by State and local sources eligible for Federal bridge assistance.
